product.name: Women's Oversized Patchwork Denim Jacket with Mini Dress
product.description: Make a bold fashion statement with this oversized patchwork denim jacket layered over a chic charcoal-grey mini dress. The jacket features mixed denim panels, wide sleeves, and a relaxed fit, offering a blend of vintage and street-style appeal. Perfect for layering during cool days, this outfit pairs effortlessly with tights and ankle boots for a trendy, urban look.

products.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body with 18-55mm Lens)
products.description: Capture stunning high-resolution images with the Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera. Designed for photography enthusiasts, it features a 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II sensor and an advanced EXR Processor II for exceptional detail and color reproduction. The included Fujinon XF 18-55mm f/2.8-4 R LM OIS lens provides versatile shooting from wide-angle landscapes to close-up portraits. With fast autofocus, continuous shooting up to 8fps, and full HD 1080p video recording, this lightweight camera delivers professional performance in a compact body. Perfect for travel, events, and creative photography.

products.name: Sony PlayStation Wireless Stereo Headset – Black
products.description: Immerse yourself in rich, high-fidelity sound with the Sony PlayStation Wireless Stereo Headset. Designed specifically for PlayStation consoles, this sleek black over-ear headset delivers powerful audio and clear chat with a built-in microphone. With wireless connectivity, 7.1 virtual surround sound, and up to 8 hours of battery life, it’s perfect for intense gaming sessions. Comfortable ear cushions and a foldable design make it ideal for long hours of gameplay and easy portability. Level up your gaming audio experience today.

products.name: Women's Elegant White Lace-Collar Cotton Shirt
products.description: Add timeless elegance to your wardrobe with this stylish white cotton shirt, featuring a delicate lace-trimmed collar and front ruffle detail. Designed with a relaxed fit, full puff sleeves, and a soft breathable fabric, it pairs perfectly with jeans or formal trousers. Ideal for office, casual outings, or semi-formal events. Stay effortlessly chic and comfortable all day.

products.name: Women's High-Waisted Light Blue Skinny Jeans
products.description: Step into effortless style with these high-waisted light blue skinny jeans. Crafted from a premium stretch denim blend, they offer a flattering fit, excellent comfort, and all-day wearability. The classic five-pocket design and clean finish make them a versatile choice for pairing with everything from casual tees to dressy tops. A wardrobe essential for every modern woman.

products.name: Men's Classic White Slim Fit Cotton Shirt
products.description: Stay sharp and stylish with this classic white slim-fit shirt, tailored for a clean and modern silhouette. Made from breathable cotton fabric, it features a crisp collar, full sleeves, and a flattering cut that's perfect for both formal and casual occasions. Pair it effortlessly with trousers or jeans for a polished look that never goes out of style.

products.name: Women's Oversized Graphic T-Shirt – "I'm Leaving to Smoke Weed" Print
products.description: Make a bold statement with this oversized white graphic tee featuring a quirky and colorful cartoon design with the text “I’m Leaving to Smoke Weed.” Made from soft, breathable cotton, this unisex-style t-shirt offers ultimate comfort and street-style edge. Pair it with high-waisted jeans, shorts, or joggers for a relaxed, expressive look. Perfect for casual outings, concerts, or just showing off your personality.

products.name: Men's Off-White Casual Cotton Shacket
products.description: Stay effortlessly stylish with this off-white cotton shacket — a versatile blend of shirt and jacket. Featuring front chest pockets, button-down closure, and a relaxed fit, this lightweight layer is perfect for both casual and semi-formal looks. Wear it over a plain tee or button it up for a cleaner silhouette. Ideal for transitional weather and minimalist fashion lovers.

products.name: Women's Oversized Patchwork Denim Jacket with Mini Dress
products.description: Make a bold fashion statement with this oversized patchwork denim jacket layered over a chic charcoal-grey mini dress. The jacket features mixed denim panels, wide sleeves, and a relaxed fit, offering a blend of vintage and street-style appeal. Perfect for layering during cool days, this outfit pairs effortlessly with tights and ankle boots for a trendy, urban look.

products.name: Men's Classic White Linen Shirt
products.description: Elevate your wardrobe with this timeless white linen shirt, designed for a relaxed yet sophisticated look. Featuring two chest flap pockets, a button-up front, and rolled-up sleeves, this shirt is perfect for casual outings, office wear, or evening gatherings. The breathable linen fabric ensures all-day comfort, keeping you cool and stylish in any season.

products.name: Women's Elegant Floral Print Maxi Dress
products.description: Step into effortless style with this elegant floral print maxi dress, featuring a flattering fit-and-flare silhouette. Made from lightweight and breathable fabric, it offers short sleeves, a tie-waist belt, and a graceful flow that moves beautifully with every step. Perfect for brunch dates, garden parties, or casual summer outings.

products.name: Women's White Cropped Denim Jacket
products.description: Stay chic and stylish with this white cropped denim jacket, designed with a high-neck button closure and structured fit. The versatile design pairs perfectly with jeans, skirts, or dresses, making it ideal for layering in any season. Crafted from durable denim with a modern cut, it’s a must-have for a bold, street-style look.

products.name: Men's Casual Black Graphic T-Shirt
products.description: Keep it effortlessly cool with this black graphic t-shirt, featuring a minimal red logo detail on the chest. Made from soft and breathable cotton, it offers a relaxed fit for all-day comfort. Perfect to pair with chinos, jeans, or shorts for a laid-back, modern look.

products.name: Men's Pastel Pink Hoodie
products.description: Stay comfortable and stylish with this pastel pink hoodie and jogger set, perfect for casual outings or lounging at home. The hoodie features a relaxed fit with a drawstring hood and front pocket, while the matching joggers offer an elastic waistband and tapered design. Made from soft, breathable cotton blend fabric for all-day comfort.

products.name: Men's Graphic Print T-Shirt
products.description: Add an edgy vibe to your casual wardrobe with this bold graphic print t-shirt, featuring a collage of artistic designs in monochrome and muted tones. Paired with light-wash distressed jeans, this look is perfect for street-style enthusiasts. The soft cotton fabric ensures comfort, while the modern fit keeps you effortlessly stylish.

products.name: Men's Oversized Pink T-Shirt
products.description: Keep it casual and trendy with this oversized pink t-shirt, designed for a relaxed fit and ultimate comfort. Made from soft, breathable cotton, it’s perfect for daily wear, lounging, or pairing with jeans and shorts for a laid-back style.

products.name: Men's Oversized Black T-Shirt
products.description: A versatile wardrobe essential, this oversized black t-shirt offers a relaxed fit and minimal design for effortless styling. Crafted from soft, breathable cotton, it’s perfect for casual outings, layering, or pairing with jeans, joggers, and shorts for a timeless look.

products.name: Women's Casual Beige T-Shirt with Blue Overshirt
products.description: chieve a laid-back yet stylish look with this beige oversized t-shirt layered under a lightweight blue button-up overshirt. Paired with classic black wide-leg trousers, this outfit is perfect for casual outings, travel days, or relaxed work environments. Crafted from soft, breathable fabric for all-day comfort.

products.name: Women's Classic White Button-Up Shirt
products.description: Embrace timeless style with this crisp white button-up shirt paired with relaxed-fit wide-leg blue jeans. The shirt features a clean collar, long sleeves, and a slightly oversized fit, making it perfect for both casual and smart-casual looks. Crafted from breathable cotton for comfort and ease of movement.

products.name: Women's Casual Wide-Leg Pants
products.description: Achieve a relaxed yet chic look with this outfit featuring a fitted white tank top layered under an airy oversized shirt. Paired with high-waist wide-leg trousers in a dark tone, this ensemble is perfect for casual strolls, weekend outings, or travel. The breathable fabrics ensure all-day comfort, while the laid-back styling keeps it effortlessly fashionable.

products.name: Women's White Cable-Knit Sweater
products.description: Stay cozy and stylish with this white cable-knit sweater, featuring a textured pattern and a relaxed fit. Paired with a sleek black mini skirt, this outfit offers a chic contrast perfect for autumn strolls, casual outings, or coffee dates. Made from soft, warm fabric to keep you comfortable without compromising on style.
